help.name: predict reaction in batch
help.command: predict reaction in batch from [dataframe < dataframe_name > ] | [file '<file_name.csv>'] | list ['#smiles','#smiles']  [USING ( ai_model='<existing_model>']) [use_saved]
help.description:
This command forward predictions reactions allowing a list from a file or data frame or string list to be processed for predictions in batch displaying the result, all resulta are saved to the toolkit directory and the [use_saved] clause tells the command to use any already saved reaction predictions . 
 e.g. 
 "predict reaction batch  from list ['BrBr.c1ccc2cc3ccccc3cc2c1CCO' ,'BrBr.c1ccc2cc3ccccc3cc2c1']" 
  it will also support multiple forward reactions using the follwing command:
 "predict reaction in batch  from list ['BrBr.c1ccc2cc3ccccc3cc2c1CCO' ,'BrBr.c1ccc2cc3ccccc3cc2c1','Cl.CCC(=O)NCCC.O']" 
The valid Options for the USING Clause  ai_model=<quoted string>  model release. Defaults to '2020-07-01'
